job description:
Sr. Data Scientist, IoT Security
Job description
Description
What We Are Doing:
BHO Tech is at the forefront of IoT Security. As the world becomes more and more connected so does the need for products. We are looking for individuals that want to be at the ground floor of building a product that addresses the worlds most challenging security problems. Innovation starts here, visionaries welcomed!
San Jose Engineering organization is looking for seasoned cyber security data scientist to drive the delivery of world-class IoT security intelligence content. An ideal candidate has deep technical background in security research, reverse engineering, machine learning, data modeling, clustering and classification, industry experience in mining endpoint, network and security data, strong problem solving skills, and most importantly a can-do attitude. As a key member of our IoT device cloud team, the candidate will work closely with cloud development team and CounterACT software development team to ensure that security solution constantly addresses the newest IoT attacks with high accuracy. This is a rare opportunity to work with a group of super smart technical talents to solve the most challenging security problems.
We are open to candidates of different experience levels.
What You Will Do

Work with a group of security researchers and data scientists to analyze unique context-rich endpoint and network traffic data collected through our cloud platform;
Identify additional data sets that can be useful in refining and enhancing Our clients IoT security policy engine;
Apply advanced machine learning algorithms to classify IoT devices and detect anomalous device behavior;
Suggest CounterACT software enhancements and define detailed requirements with software development team. Ensure accurate implementation;
Develop, test, release and maintain periodical security content update;
Be responsible for the overall quality of Our clients IoT security intelligence content.
What You Bring To Our client

Most importantly, true startup spirit and strong can do attitude. Willing to wear multiple hats when needed;
3+ years of industry experience in security research and/or data science;
Experience in endpoint, network or application security;
Experience in IoT security highly desirable;
PhD degree with cyber security focus highly desirable;
Experience in advanced machine learning algorithms highly desirable;
Experience in data mining and information retrieval with large data set highly desirable;
Strong problem solving skills
Ability to analyze complex multi-dimensional problems using systematic approach to achieve quick solution
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Strong teamwork spirit
Ability to influence with or without authority
Self-starter
Ability to efficiently collaborate with cross-functional teams
What Our client Offers You
Strong product, good leadership, great culture, good people, diverse, great benefits, great compensation. If you have good work ethic, are visible, lean in, you will be recognized. We are in growth mode and there is tons of opportunity. A positive attitude and being flexible to change goes a long way here at Our client!

Competitive compensation and Benefits
Collaborative and innovative environment make an impact on worldwide security while working on the hottest technology.
We work hardand we PLAY hard
